metadata.title: CVE-2016-3993 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Off-by-one error in the __imlib_MergeUpdate function in lib/updates.c inimlib2 before 1.4.9 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds read and application crash) via crafted coordinates.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3993` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libimlib2 - 1.4.7-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: imlib2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.7-1ubuntu0.1').
